title: The Pianist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, Practice at someone's house.
- At night, you may instead Figure someone out. You may only target someone you've seen while Practicing before.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While Practicing, you learn the names of all first-time visitors to your target. You also learn the number of players that visited that were not first-time visitors, but you don't learn their names.
- While Figuring someone out, learn the last 3 evil roles that visited them. You don't learn what nights. You can receive duplicate results from the same visitor.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid your county of rapscallions and varmint.

desc:
Post 4585
*Always in the corner of the saloon. He picks up on things quickly -- melodies, rhythms, faces.*
